item.title: Roblox Rebrands ‘Friends’ Feature as Gaming Platform Launches New Age-Estimation Teen Safety Tools
item.description: Roblox is saying goodbye to its “Friends.” Following ongoing reports and accusations of grooming and predatory behavior experienced by its younger-skewing users, the gaming platform rolled
